name: Add Adsense
author: seosbg

sections.description: Add Adsense WordPress plugin allows you to add adsense fields in your theme. Simply amazing and easy to use. To learn more about the Add Adsense plugin please see Plugin URI. See screenshot examples at https://www.seosthemes.com/add-adsense/
sections.installation:
Install via Plugins > Install New

  1. Search for “Add Adsense”
  2. Click the “Install Now” link
  3. Click “Activate Plugin”

Via ZIP / FTP

  1. Unzip the ZIP file and drop the folder straight into your wp-content/plugins directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
sections.faq:
Is there a tutorial?

See the Tutorial

Where can I find documentation on the plugin?

Refer the Plugin Site
